metrics.trend: Sustained high performance — 17 accepted, 2 deferred (both resolved), 0 rejected. Audit #29 (barrel file conflicts) accepted and verified working across 7 sequential PRs. TS port executing at extraordinary velocity (62 modules in ~2 hours). Recommendation surface shifting to cross-repo coordination timing (QC TS infrastructure gap). Acceptance rate 90%.

last_cycle.summary: Ninth audit cycle. Audit #29 (barrel file conflicts) accepted by both orchestrators — closed, verified working across 7 PRs. TS port accelerated dramatically: Phase 1 merged, Phases 2a-3c completed, 62 TS modules on master. Phase 3d in-flight. QC sessions #117-119 show healthy steady state. Identified QC TS validation infrastructure timing risk — filed #32. Acceptance rate improved to 90%.
